title: 2126 N Clay St
posting_body: ['Text', 'show contact info', 'to setup a showing!', 'Virtual tour: 2126 N Clay St', 'AREA:', 'Denver / Jefferson Park', 'FEATURES:', 'Rooftop deck, washer, and dryer, AC, stainless steel appliances.', 'INCLUDED UTILITIES: Water and trash removal.', 'TENANT PAID UTILITIES:', 'All other utilities are paid by the tenant.', 'BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms', 'KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Stainless steel refrigerator, stove, dishwasher.', 'Garbage disposal.', 'LAUNDRY: Washer and dryer.', 'FLOORING:', 'Wood floors, carpet in the bedrooms.', 'HEAT/COOLING: Central heat and AC.', 'PARKING: 2 car attached garage.', 'FENCING:', 'N/A', 'BASEMENT: N/A', 'RESTRICTIONS: Pets are considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.', 'Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'The security deposit is $3750.', 'APPLICATION FEE: $30 per adult.', 'Please note we have a 700 minimum credit score for all properties.', 'AVAILABILITY DATE: 8/31/2022.', "**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.", '**', 'LEASE TERM: Minimum of 12 months, possible multi-year lease available.', 'Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.', 'Minimum 700 credit score required.', '*RES does not manage this property and RES is not involved in the approval process for tenants.', 'Approval for leasing this property will be subject to landlord approval.*']
